content:
Is this issue still relevant? I tested the code on my machine and I am getting different (and maybe unreliable) result...
Here's the link for convenient... https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/63340

So, should we change implementation of collect to use for_each() ? Note that a for loop doesn't solve the problem. For this to be optimized we need to use for_each().

can anyone direct me to the file that is responsible for implementing collect for chain?
